instruction: Write a web scraper in Python to extract information from a table on a website.
buggy_code:
import requests
import lxml.html as lh
url = 'https://www.example.com/'
page = requests.get(url)
doc = lh.fromstring(page.content)
tr_elements = doc.xpath('//tr')
col = []
i = 0
for t in tr_elements[0]:
    i += 1
    name = t.text_content()
    print('%d:"%s"' % (i, name))
    col.append((name, []))
for j in range(1, len(tr_elements)):
    T = tr_elements[j]
    if len(T) != 3:
        break
    i = 0
    for t in T.iterchildren():
        data = t.text_content()
        if i > 0:
            try:
                data = int(data)
            except:
                pass
        col[i][1].append(data)
        i += 1
cat_breeds = col[1][0]
